name: DISC ROOM (itch) (xEVANZx)
description:
You are locked in a lab deep on the forest. You can only advance searching for an exit...

If you lose some surfaces just press F5 to restart the level & fix it.

KEYS: Arrows  to  MOVE 
Z   to   JUMP 
X   to   DASH

*The game is based on my proyect for the GM48 JAM.

In a future update I'll add 100+ levels with different obstacles & new interactions with the environment.

It was fun to code it all on the time limit...
